titles.title: Pathway for Inclusive Participation of Emerging Leaders and Institutions in the NatSec Enterprise Act of 2020
Pathway for Inclusive Participation of Emerging Leaders and Institutions in the NatSec Enterprise Act of 2020
PIPELINE Act of 2020
PIPELINE Act of 2020
PIPELINE Act of 2020

To establish a scholarship program to diversify the national security workforce through partnership with historically Black colleges and universities and other minority institutions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
